Quests.Name: randy_coffee
Quests.Title: Randy wants some Coffee
Quests.Description: Randy wants coffee, more important: don't tell Charlie...

Quests.Name: guntherwoods_request
Quests.Title: Gunther Lost Artifact
Quests.Description: Gunther lost an artefact from the museum, and he needs you to find it somewhere. Find the Dwarf Scroll and deliver to him, it's somewhere in the mountains...
Quests.Objective: Find the item and give it to Gunther
Quests.ReactionText: Thank you @.$h#$b#I can't believe that I lost this. Don't tell anyone about it, if the Governor hears...$s#$b#But anyway, here is something for you, and other one to help you on making friendship with my nephew.$h

Quests.Name: charlie_foodrequest_sve
Quests.Title: Something to cheer Gunther up
Quests.Description: Charlie wants to give something to Gunther. Bring the Mayonnaise to Charlie. You will receive the proper payment after it.
Quests.ReactionText: Oh, really thank you @!$h#$b#This is something that Gunther likes a lot, and it looks homemade, so it's even better!$h

Quests.Name: charlie_wintercoffee_craft
Quests.Title: Getting warm
Quests.Description: Charlie is asking for a good coffee made of the farm. Make a coffee and deliver to him. (You must craft the item or it won't work).

Quests.Name: charlie_wintercoffee_deliver
Quests.Title: Getting even warmer
Quests.Description: Now that you have made the coffee, deliver it to Charlie.
Quests.ReactionText: Oh this is marvelous @!$h#$b#I love this type of coffee, it smells like home...$h#$b#Here @, your payment.

Quests.Name: charlie_beachforage_1
Quests.Title: Fossil delivery
Quests.Description: Charlie wants a Clam to seek for fossils. He needs for investigations of the museum.
Quests.Objective: Find and deliver a Clam to Charlie
Quests.ReactionText: Oh this is exactly what I needed!$h#$b$This will help so much in the museum explorations on the fossils!#$b#Thanks for taking my request @! Here is your payment.
